Constant condition.description: A condition that always evaluates to 'true' or always evaluates to 'false' should be removed, and if the condition is a loop condition, the condition is likely to cause an infinite loop.

Locking the 'this' object in a lock stat.err_name: Locking the 'this' object in a lock statement
Locking the 'this' object in a lock stat.description: It is bad practice to lock the 'this' object because it might be locked elsewhere.

Potentially dangerous use of non-short-c.err_name: Potentially dangerous use of non-short-circuit logic
Potentially dangerous use of non-short-c.description: The & and | operators do not use short-circuit evaluation and can be dangerous when applied to boolean operands. In particular, their use can result in errors if the left-hand operand checks for cases in which it is not safe to evaluate the right-hand one.

Redundant Select.description: Writing 'seq.Select(e => e)' or 'from e in seq select e' is redundant.
